name: Stay Away
flavor_text: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description:
One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher with remote detonation. 
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
Grenade detonation has a brief blinding effect.
  •  Greatly decreases blast radius.
perks.name: Blinding Grenades
